about_the_game:
​Meat Fest is a first-person shooter inspired by the Doom series of games with mutated animals. Built on the foundation of good old shooters, it raises the social problems of society.

Humanity was forced to leave their home planet and settle on Radix, where leaders tell new generations that the Earth was destroyed as a result of natural disasters. Combat geneticist Marcus Berger, studying samples from the homeland of people, begins to realize how false such statements about the death of the world are. He becomes increasingly immersed in the search for truth and reaches out to black market dealers, consisting mainly of the opposition. His native corporation begins to see him as a dangerous unit and Marcus escapes from Radix, deciding to find answers on Earth. The player will have to face the current inhabitants of the cradle of humanity and find evidence of the theory of a man-made disaster, because of which the world has turned into hell.

To answer questions you will have to use a wide arsenal of weapons, an ax, and a suit to protect and dodge fatal blows and dangerous fauna. Collect the story piece by piece to get to the truth, which, as always, lurks somewhere nearby.

MORE

  • Jump Pads will help you overcome the path of the chosen one, survive in battle or replenish supplies

  • You'll have to choose...

  • Portals will save you at the most tense moment, when there is no way out

  • A reward awaits those who are especially attentive

  • Any skills are useful in the Arenas

short_description: Single player story shooter of the old school. For those who like to cut meat, an ax is provided, and upgrading your equipment will enhance the flavor of the dish. Find answers to the question: why did the Earth become unsuitable for human life?
supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
